name: Stupid Pet Tricks Game Pack v1.0
name_original: Stupid Pet Tricks Game Pack v1.0
description:
Stupid Pet Tricks Game Pack V1.0

Supports the Stupid PET tricks joystick device. All games written in machine language but are UNTESTED on the actual hardware. Please report any bugs so I can update.

Brickblasta (3000 and 4000 series PET's)
Author: Milasoft

Bugg - Centipede clone for 3000 and 4000 series PETs
Author: Kevin Pickell

Candyman - Pacman clone for 3000 and 4000 series PETs
Author: Kevin Pickell

Gridrunner - Supports all PET series
Author: Milasoft

Land slide - Supports 3000 and 4000 series
Author: Kevin Pickell

Scramble - Supports 2000 series (joy not tested)
Author: N. Krueger

Star Spores - Supports 3000 and 4000 series PETs
Author: Jim Summers

Star Force - No joy support but modified this version to work on the 2000 series only. Was it ever available for the 2000 series?
Author: Satoshi Matsuoka

Leap Frog - Frogger game supports 3000 and 4000 series PETs
Author: ???
